skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lametric time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
LaMetric Time is the first connected clock for smart home. It enhances your bedroom, living room or kitchen with award winning design and displays vital information for the whole family.

With LaMetric Time skill you can see what is important to you by asking Alexa.

Imagine you woke up in the morning. Ask LaMetric Time for weather forecast and see it right on the display. When you are cooking a dish, easily setup countdown timer without touching the clock and track cooking time at a glance. Ready for sleep? Set an alarm on your bedside clock from living room.

Connect your clock to Wi-Fi and press "Enable Skill" button inside the Alexa App to get started. Link your Alexa to LaMetric account by entering login and password and you are all set!
Important: please make sure your LaMetric Time is running firmware 1.7.3 or newer.

Here are some phrases you can try:

Alarm clock
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to wake me up at 7 AM."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set radio to wake me up at 8 AM."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to enable alarm."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to disable alarm."

Timer
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set timer for 10 minutes."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to pause the timer."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to resume the timer."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to reset the timer."

Stopwatch
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to start a stopwatch."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to pause the stopwatch."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to resume the stopwatch."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to reset the stopwatch."

Radio
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to turn on the radio."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to play next radio station."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to play previous radio station."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to stop the radio."

Activating apps
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to show weather forecast."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to activate clock."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to activate next app."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to switch to previous app."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to activate weather."

LaMetric Time Device Configuration
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to enable Bluetooth."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to disable Bluetooth."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set volume to 100 percent."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to increase volume."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to decrease volume."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set brightness to 80 percent."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set brightness to the highest value."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set brightness to the lowest value."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to set auto brightness mode."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to enable screensaver when dark."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to enable screensaver between 10 PM. and 6 AM."
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time to disable screensaver."

To get help, say:
- "Alexa, ask LaMetric Time for help."
- "Alexa, open LaMetric Time."
